DOC.brief_title: Step Step : A Tailored Walking Intervention Breast Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: More two-thirds breast cancer survivor physically inactive . Inactivity know negatively impact morbidity mortality , especially pronounce among cancer survivor . Self-directed intervention target inactivity among breast cancer survivor often report clinically insignificant behavior change . More successful behavior change intervention suggest tailoring , recently , foster intrinsic motivation , may improve outcome . However , intervention date utilized approach increase physical activity among sedentary cancer survivor . AIM 1 : Develop test intervention ( tailor ) comparison group ( target ) message sample sedentary woman determine message acceptability . AIM 2 : Determine efficacy 12-week tailor intervention increase number weekly step take among sedentary post-treatment breast cancer survivor compare 12-week , target intervention .
